website_summaries.verdict: This multi-tier plant display stand can double up as a storage solution for your home. Highly functional and customizable.
pros: We love the solid bamboo construction that's totally customizable to your needs
Not only does it offer a way to display your plant pots, but you can use it as extra storage or for displaying trinkets
cons: Some pre-drilled holes are off center

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! We bought two and connected them. Sturdy too!! We are thinking of buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: attractive and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for to house our patio herb garden. Sturdy and easy enough for me to put together myself in about 10 minutes. Seems like it may peel if it gets dripped on from the watering can so I coated it with some clear spray paint to help with water resistance. We'll see how it does. Pots are 8" diameter for reference.
customer_reviews.author: art major

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shelving system for my "Sedum Bowl Obsession." Not wanting them to freeze this winter, I need to bring them inside. I ordered 1 set of shelves, then realized I needed another one, and being able to connect them was a huge plus. I liked the way the shelf looked on the picture, so I didn't alter them, but you can do this. I would definitely recommend them and they're easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Lee

customer_reviews.title: Moldy surfaces after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased one shelf kit. Liking the product design and ease of assembly, I purchased 3 more plus a 2-tier shoe bench. I live in Hawaii. After just a few weeks in our home there is mold growing all over the products, especially on the inside surface of the slats. Yesterday I spent several hours cleaning them with full strength vinegar. I would recommend these ONLY for someone who lives in a LOW HUMIDITY environment.
customer_reviews.author: Marti808

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted. It's sturdy and looks great. I dressed mine up a bit and when I put it together, I put the lip side up so things couldn't easily fall. I have little grandchildren to thank for that idea. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Honestly

customer_reviews.title: Good and sturdy..! A little pricey though..
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The stand is good, sturdy, easy to assemble and not too heavy which makes it easier for portability.. The material being bamboo, it can be cleaned very easily and even the water droplets can be wiped off just wih a cloth when compared to a metal stand which gets rusty easily. Cons: I feel that the price is a little expensive for the product. It would have been better if the shelves are more spacious or bigger with enough room for the plants to grow. Apart from the top row (3) shelves, I could not place my medium sized plants elsewhere in the stand, all the other compartments can be used only for smaller plants.
customer_reviews.author: Santhosh

customer_reviews.title: A great product. I got this to sit in a ...
customer_reviews.text: A great product. I got this to sit in a window and hold succulents. It also holds the watering can and some spare dirt as storage. It is high enough off of the ground that it has good airflow. Mine has to sit over a vent. It goes together easily. The bolts are sturdy and slide in without problems. Their color lets them blend in. While I wouldn't climb it, for holding things it does a great job. The way it is set up you can easily attach more of them together if you needed. Just a super attractive piece.
customer_reviews.author: M Holmes

customer_reviews.title: The perfect plant stand
customer_reviews.text: The perfect plant stand. It's lite so I can move it for cleaning and get to the window. The wood color goes well with everything. Lots of room for the money. Completely satisfied. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Roberteallen56

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf for succulents, easy to assemble once you get going
customer_reviews.text: I have a new hobby: succulents! I share an apartment porch with a next door apartment, so I needed something like this to keep all my little plants organized but looking good. The quality of the bamboo felt great and it was overall easy to assemble once you figured out the general scheme of things. If you are a little unsteady with your hands, I would recommend a friend to help hold the first few pieces to get you started, but otherwise everything went better than I expected. Great shelf, and my apartment neighbor already commented she might want one for herself!
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: Beauty AND Value!
customer_reviews.text: This is just an amazing and beautifully crafted piece for the money! Super easy to assemble. I could not be happier. I think it would be beautiful in any room of a house - it's that nice.
customer_reviews.author: KarenH

customer_reviews.title: it was super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a plant stand, it was super easy to put together, sturdy, shipped fast, and looks great. Our plants fit nicely on it. Only issue is that the lower shelves don't have much clearance for anything other than small plants and planters, but overall, great shelves, might purchase another set.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wood, bad hardware and quality control
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to return this. One of the predrilled holes in the bamboo wasn't straight, so the screw couldn't go in correctly and it broke in half. I was really, really surprised to see a screw just snap apart with only the force of my hand and the tiny wrench included with the shelf. Another of the sides was also cracked down the side from one of the screw holes, which I imagine happened when it was being predrilled. The wood is great quality and the shelf would have been beautiful, but the hardware and quality control are lacking.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome plant shelf
customer_reviews.text: Super light yet sturdy and easy to put together! I might buy another one to add on to the first one and make one long shelf for plants
customer_reviews.author: K. I.

customer_reviews.title: Love this...and love my tidy closet.
customer_reviews.text: Love this shelf. We cut 6 inches off the bottom. We lost the bottom middle shelf but now it fits nicely under my hanging clothes in my closet. As it is bamboo, tape where the cut will be to reduce splintering, what splinters there were sanded off easily. The shelves are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Hoon of the Moon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful construction, looks great! Would be good for plants or storage for anything else. Would recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great shelving for plants
customer_reviews.text: This was probably the easiest piece of furniture I've put together. I'm big on directions, but you honestly don't need them with this. I bought this to have outside on my front patio to hold my plants and couldn't be happier with how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: H.Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Enough spaces
customer_reviews.text: I bought this plant stand because I only have one window that I can use for my plants that come in for the winter, so I needed something that looked nice and had enough space. This plant stand is the perfect space I needed. It was very easy to put together and it looks very expensive. Love the look.
customer_reviews.author: pc

customer_reviews.title: High quality stand!
customer_reviews.text: Had a more detailed review here but my browser suddenly closed (likely due to operator mishap) and erased everything. Just saying it was high quality and thanks to the reviews already provided, I went ahead and got this, too. Put it together with a Allen wrench drill bit to save time. High quality stand!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Bartolotta

customer_reviews.title: Nice Holder of house plants
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted to get this to better manage some plants we have in our house. I was ambivalent about purchasing it first, but then I was surprised at how much I like it. It's compact enough not to take up too much room, but big enough to hold the plants in question. It looks nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: coopdog1

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: We have a small patio, and this really brings a lot of beauty to it in a simple little package. We're able to keep a mix of larger pots on the top for our plants that require more sunlight, while keeping some cute little pots in the lower shelves that need more shade. Our herbs are growing nicely! It was easy to put together and seems very sturdy. Using it outdoors, so we'll see how long it lasts with the weather, but I'm confident it won't deteriorate too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Goofbalg

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Bamboo Plant Stand
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality of this shelf. It was super easy to put together; it took me about ~15 minutes or so on a Saturday morning. The material feels pretty sturdy and durable, I'm sure it will last a long time indoors. I wouldn't recommend keeping it outside unless you coated it with some sort of weather resistant coating. It even looks good as two independence shelves, as I ended up leaving out the middle shelves in order to save some space. Overall a very simple, modern, and customizable shelf!
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: This shelf is really great. It was so easy to put together and ...
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is really great. It was so easy to put together and you can change the levels if you like. I like that it is so open with the spaces in between each board and it is sturdy. I have plants and home décor on it in my first room study and I am very pleased how it turned out.
customer_reviews.author: Texas RN Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Not level
customer_reviews.text: Item is nice but it is not level. Holes not drilled in correct place. Wobbly 9-13-18. Update Not sure what happened I just received another unit not sure if it’s an accident or on purpose. If the seller is reading this please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Yates

customer_reviews.title: Great patio planter stand
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a light, durable stand to get my back porch plants off the ground high enough that my backyard chickens wouldn't eat them. This bamboo stand was easy to assemble and easy to move to the desired spot. It's narrow enough to fit my small patio nicely, but large enough to hold some decent sized ceramic planters. I like that you can customize which shelves to include - I left out the middle ones of each stack so that I could fit some taller plants on the bottom. It seems sturdy and has held up well thus far. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Land

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful, just what I have been looking for. I live by the water and everything rusts, this being bamboo I'm sure it will last in the balcony. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Josefina

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was quite easy, did not use the directions at all
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was quite easy, did not use the directions at all. No problems with splitting bamboo as other have mentioned. The shelf is balanced and level. It is also larger that I had anticipated. Would purchase again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: MLK57

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you, I needed this planter stand for the indoors so when it gets too cold outside for my plants I have something to put them on inside. This stand has exceeded my expectations, in quality, sturdiness, assembly, and fast shipping. I love the dark espresso color, perfect for my living room space. I purchased two. I assembled them by myself and my husband was jealous :-), that's how easy it was. I comes with screws and a Allen wrench. It takes a lot of screws but it's worth it. Great quality for the price. I say buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa's Closet

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this plant stand!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this beautiful stand. All of my plants look so nice on it, and it's sturdy enough to hold them all, including some larger pots. It took me about 30 minutes to put together by myself, but it'd be half the time with two people. It was a bit wobbly at first, but after fitting the two tower pieces together, it became more stable. All of the drill holes were even too. One of the rungs was a bit crooked on one of the shelf pieces, but it was still snug in place, so it was more of a cosmetic issue than anything else. Overall, amazing and 5/5!
customer_reviews.author: Err

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shelving unit for my plants. Was easy to assemble and sturdy enough for medium sized otter plants.
customer_reviews.author: 4everwinter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and it’s beautiful as well as sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing many stands simaler to this one I have to say this one is Awesome! The quality is outstanding. Far better than I expected. Ladies - It was sooo easy to put together it took me only about 15 mins. The only tool you need comes with it. This stand is very sturdy & beautiful at a very good price. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Butrfly51

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I ordered this product late October 2018. It arrived quickly without damage and is extremely easy to assemble. Once assembled I placed pieces of cardboard under two of the legs because it was not anatomically correct. Still, no complaints thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Morenyah Delsur

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly with multiple configurations
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my home and couldn't be happier. The shelves look great, which seems to have enhanced the beauty of my plants. I've received numerous compliments for them. The only issue that I've encountered is that the clamp light I use will not stay attached to the shelf itself. It will, however, stay affixed to the frame. Again, this is a minor issue and would not prevent me from purchasing the item again.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping, first of all. Second, it was very easy to assemble, made easier with a second pair of hands to help hold first couple pieces in place, and the use of an electric screwdriver (although it includes what is needed). Once it was up, I moved it onto our deck for now and arranged all my succulents on it (see photos). It is quite sturdy and looks beautiful. I would definitely buy this again (and if I keep buying baby succulents, I just might need another!). I could also be used for towels or other items for bathroom or kitchen or living room.
customer_reviews.author: eldoradoeh

customer_reviews.title: pretty and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I use this to store my plant pots while they are inside in the winter. It was very easy to assemble, can be assembled in several configurations and seems durable and sturdy, if your pots and plants are small or medium size. The pieces fit well together and are connected with screws. I only assembled it today, so I do not know about long term sturdiness, but I am very pleased with the finished look and it is bigger than my previous one, which is a plus. Overall, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Plant Shelving!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set that I've purchased for my ever-growing (in more ways than one, I hope) plant collection. It's easy to put together, is highly stable, and is very attractive to boot. What more could one ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: A Great Looking Quality Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Looks great as a plant stand in our kitchen nook. To accommodate the height of plants I simply left out the middle shelf in each column. The wood is beautiful and is unique enough that it complements and does not conflict with the other wood in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Rob in Mountains

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for what I wanted. Easy to assemble. DO NOT OVER-TIGHTEN SCREWS! This is bamboo, not oak. Power tools will be too much. I have tendinitis in my hands, but had no problems with the wrench. I deducted one star because the pictures show different shelf configurations, but the countersinks for the screws only allow the basic unless you don't mind screw heads sticking out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best plant stand! Worth the price because it will last a very long time!  Well made; well designed!
customer_reviews.text: I had an old Cost Plus plant stand, which was similar in design but not in sturdiness. I was amazed to find this plant stand which is more beautiful and so much better built. It was also very easy to assemble -- less than 30 minutes. I was a bit worried that the "natural" color would be unfinished, but it has a nice sheen to it. It came with a strap to secure it to the wall, but it stands quite well just free standing -- unless you plan to put heavy objects on it.
customer_reviews.author: Maxixe

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Solid. Versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble! The company provides extra screws, which is nice. Once put together it looks just like the photos—no more, no less. The screws will show once you’re done, but that’s to be expected at this price, which is right on point. This thing is surprisingly versatile. I’m using it as decorative storage in my master bedroom (candles, baskets, meditation cushion, etc.), and it looks great. Going to order another one to match.
customer_reviews.author: HalJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as a plant stand in front of my picture window, and love it. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: B. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Very nice plant stand!
customer_reviews.text: This plant stand is very attractive. I like that it's made from bamboo and the color is a go-with-everything shade. I was able to put it together myself, but it took longer than it should have taken. The instructions are mostly illustrations and almost no text. There are two sizes of pre-drilled holes on the shelves and supports. The most important thing is to follow the pictures, and use the LARGE holes to attach the shelves. I learned this the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: gardengranny

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this plant rack! Gorgeous bamboo material and quite sturdy. I honestly wasn’t expecting to be this smitten with it. It works perfectly for what I wanted and totally worth the price. I could not wait to assemble this and put it to good use as soon as I opened the box and saw how pretty the bamboo looked. It only took about 10-15 minutes to put it together. 100% satisfied :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Perez

customer_reviews.title: Came broken out the box
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the picture this came broken out-of-the-box it will still work but it’s frustrating that you pay for something and It shows a broken.
customer_reviews.author: Mat Riley

customer_reviews.title: Nice (but not perfect) easy to construct shelving
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for lots of plants. I put some of the "legs" on backward so that i could get the lowest shelves on the left and right sides instead of the middle. Not all of the predrilled screw holes line up properly.
customer_reviews.author: cc:

customer_reviews.title: Honestly pretty darn perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this plant stand/display! Just the right size for a relatively small space! It was easy to assemble. All the parts were there. It's functional and seems solid and well made. Just a SLIGHT wobble, but once the plants were on it, it stabilized. It honestly could be my floor too, so I am not TOTALLY sure of the cause. Either way, it was nice for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Bamgela

customer_reviews.title: Nice Plant Stand
customer_reviews.text: Very nice plant stand, a little larger than I thought it would be, but looks nice. Although it has 9 shelves, only 3 of them can be used for larger plants as the height between the lower shelves only allows smaller arrangements. I put it together in about 15 Minutes using a drill-driver and my own driver bit. If you had to use the hex wrench that came with it, you would be spending upwards of an hour or more to screw in the pieces. Save yourself some time and use a drill-driver. Overall, very nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Stockholder

customer_reviews.title: Good only for succulents.Excellent costumer service!
customer_reviews.text: Plants will not fully grow. Spaces are too small. I have to review again. Because of the great costumer service this company offers, I have to give them four starts. The product is sturdy but keep in mind that is small. The seller is excellent to deal with, congratulations for a great costumer service. Buy with confident. Many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Gallagerth3

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I got it for a plant stand for my porch. It was pretty easy to put together. I had someone helping me but I could've done it myself. It comes with the tools to assemble it (an allen wrench + screws). They boast about all these different ways to assemble it, but to be honest, the way in the main photo is really the only good way to do it. The screws can only go in on one side so it limits your options. It's a really big shelf, I am super happy with the size and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: ... area for all my plants and this looked really good. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much of it but I really need more surface area for all my plants and this looked really good. Great quality. I got an open box but it looked brand new still. Held a lot of plants. Minus one star because there was a little wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Phil N

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shelves for my porch for plants. I ordered the brown to match my brown wicker patio set and it looks great. It was packed very well and NO missing parts and the directions were so good and easy. I had it built in 30 minutes and I am a 75 year old woman!!! I love this and would order more if I had another place for it!
customer_reviews.author: janb

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Well Designed. Easy to Build.
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and all parts were in the box. Really easy to assemble, but heed the warning and do not over tighten any screw. Bamboo can crack if you exert too much pressure on that final turn of the screw driver. Also, it helps in lining up all the parts by fairly loosely connecting the screws initially, and then tightening (carefully) after all parts are aligned correctly. I like that this unit is almost infinitely expandable by purchasing additional units and bolting them together.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and was easy to put together! Isn’t 100% level but sturdy enough to hold my plants.
customer_reviews.author: Christina K. OGrady

customer_reviews.title: Modern and Simple
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look of this plant holder, very streamline and goes will with my furniture. It was easy to assemble and I like that the configuration can be modified. I will say that in hindsight be sure to check the measurements between shelving and the size of the plants that will be on there for some time. Still a great piece
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Such a beautiful piece!
customer_reviews.text: Beyond beautiful. I got this for my cat to climb on- I don't think that's what this was made for but my grown cat is only 6 lbs. She is destroying my furniture and avoids the cat trees I got her after her adoption so I thought I would try furniture especially for her. This has levels for her to hop through and I was able to weave sisal rope through the slats. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: leelee!

customer_reviews.title: Precision made and a real value
customer_reviews.text: We needed a plant stand for orchids, and this unit was beautiful and functional. We ended up buying two units, and attaching them together. The assembly was made easy by perfect alignment of the pre-drilled screw holes, which was impressive because there are quite a few of them. We've had other products from the same manufacturer, and have never had a problem. Definite recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pete on the Coast

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I'll echo all of the other positive reviews and say that I really love this assembly. Now to just keep my plants alive long enough to enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Quillen-Gesell

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to maintain
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and I love how easily you can change up the layout to fit your space. I’ve had mine outside on our patio in the elements - direct sun, rain, cold etc - for about 6mo and it doesn’t look to be deteriorating at all. I use a little handheld broom to dust it off now and then, but you can also hose it off if it gets really grimy.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo beats other wood for this product.
customer_reviews.text: This bamboo plant stand beats prior stands, made of hardwoods, previously owned. Once assembled, this lightweight stand is quite sturdy and can be easily lifted and moved (without plants on it). There are several sets of pre-drilled holes to allow for variation in plant height and design. Should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Saugahatchee Dad

customer_reviews.title: Love this Stand
customer_reviews.text: I just love this stand. It was easy to put together looks beautiful and light weight to move around. It has tons of space for storage. I would not use this for plants but in the Bathroom to store all the items you need in one place. Looks amazing on carpet and hard wood floor as well.
customer_reviews.author: Magnus

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT, I LOVE IT! I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Versatility
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for to display my potted plants. I love that you can adjust the heights of the shelves. It’s very versatile. In the instructions, it says to wear gloves in case of splinters and also says to not put it in direct sun... I haven’t had it long enough to test the long-term effect of sun exposure... But if sun does affect the paint, I’ll probably just spray paint it. Easy fix. Buying another right now lol
customer_reviews.author: Alex Shelley

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars had it not been the wobble after assembling the product. Don't get me wrong; it is sturdy, was easy to set up, and looks amazing, BUT I would not want my plants to get damaged had they tipped over due to the uneven legs. I did fix it by placing a piece of plastic under one of the legs to stabilize the piece. Overall, I would still recommend this product. SONGMICS is a great company that I have ordered other items from that are still working well.
customer_reviews.author: Kali Jan

customer_reviews.title: Shelves
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I do like these, very well made, had no issue putting them together. I did find that four of the pre made holes for the screws were striped, but I will make do. I am going to tweak mine to add side walls because of the air that can at times hit the plants. But over all these are nice and I think I might order a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M.

customer_reviews.title: Great plant stand!
customer_reviews.text: In love with this plant stand. It has so many different places to put my plants and they all easily receive light. It's a tiny bit wobbly, but nothing bad. I really love this stand and might get another one in the future! Super easy to assemble and gets the jobs done, while looking really cute and together.
customer_reviews.author: Kat C.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with this purchase. Ordered two for a small pantry area....I was pleased that they could be configured a bit differently, and they went together amazingly easily. (I put them together on the kitchen table. They are lighweight but sturdy and rather good loooking.
customer_reviews.author: Agvnigeh

customer_reviews.title: Great little stand.
customer_reviews.text: Great item. We bought two and now have a great corner stand in the living room. For some of the lower shelves, my wife uses baskets for storing a few small items and other shelves have a couple blankets for those cold winter nights. Very sturdy for being as light as it is.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done. Have used it in my living room ...
customer_reviews.text: Nicely done. Have used it in my living room for my plants and other decorative items. Its just beautiful for display. My husband who is all about the product being sturdy was very impressed with this product. The shelf is a great combination of hardiness and delicate style. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Looks fantastic and well made. Also easy to assemble be any novice or expert. It came with a few scratches but I am keeping it because of how really nice this stand is. The color is true to the photo. I am happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy A

customer_reviews.title: Looks even better than in the picture
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble (10 minutes) and seems to be very sturdy. I left it in two pieces and used them on either side of a bed as night stands. It's a great value and would recommend this product; I'll likely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hall

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in the guest bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. One shelf did crack when I tightened the screw but it didn't affect the overall strength and stability of the unit. Very sturdy & stable once assembled. No hesitation in recommending this product.
customer_reviews.author: R. HurleyTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Favorite plant stand!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and quality for an indoor plant stand!! Not sure if it would hold up outside but it seems like it would be better than the regular bamboo ones which I kept outside for about two years before it started to fall apart
customer_reviews.author: Kristenw329

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price/quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a shelf like this for my plants for a few months now. This one is perfect! Good price for the quality. Seems sturdy enough for the intended use. Super easy to put together. I did it myself in about 15 minutes. I like that it’s customizable too. Would 100% purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL PLANT SHELF
customer_reviews.text: Hated the little screwdriver as I kept dropping it as it has no grip end. Assembly done all alone and was quite easy within 30 mins; takes less time when you don't keep dropping the little screwdriver! The instructions were clear and concise. Have some substantial sized plants and no bend in the wood. Using it as a semi opaque front door entrance screen. No defects in any part of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lintuf

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! So much that I bought another one! People who say they get moldy well duh! You’re putting water and not putting a plate under the pots. Same thing would happen if you have a pot on the floor and you don’t put a plate under it! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Practical, Sustainable, and beautiful way to organize
customer_reviews.text: Super happy. I ordered two shelves after reading reviews. I was looking for a way for my grandma to organize her plants in the winter as well as provide some privacy in our street facing, ground level window. This plant shelf was shipped fast, easy to assemble (about 30 minutes per shelf) and was easy to modify. Other reviewers said you can get more shelves when connecting multiple units, but I needed space for taller plants.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Marinelli

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, sturdy plant stand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stand because I have far too many plants and needed a way for them to all get light in front of a big window. It arrived quickly, was very easy to put together, and lets my plants stand out while getting sunlight. It's very sturdy, even when my bunny hops up onto the lower shelves, I'm not at all afraid that it'll topple over. A wall mount is included, which I would definitely use if you have small kids. Also, the pieces are a little smelly when you open it, but smell quickly dissipates once assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Wilson

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, practical, works well with other Songmics products
customer_reviews.text: I use it on top of another piece of furniture and it is great for plants, books, pictures, etc. I like that the color is just like other Songmics products, so they work well together in the same room.
customer_reviews.author: J. in California

customer_reviews.title: A little wobbly but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together but even put together, it isn't the most sturdy of plant stands. However, it holds up the plants nicely and I don't plan on moving it around or jarring it, so it'll work. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: breezer01

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to be unstable, especially after loading it up with plants. Nope, it's been great. Never worried about it and my dogs tested it out by banging into it when they run and hit it on the way to barking at the squirrel in the front yard, or the bird, or the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: it looks really nice.. with some knick knacks and a bamboo ...
customer_reviews.text: it looks really nice .. with some knick knacks and a bamboo plant ..it was a bit hard to assemble the holes prolly should have been a hair bigger to the wood screws... but i got it together and it looks great
customer_reviews.author: tom c

customer_reviews.title: A great stand that offers many configuration options.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use to hold my indoor plants. It was super easy to assemble and looks great in our dining room in front of the window.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J Julian III

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I put this out on the front porch and have some lovely plants on the shelves. It was easy to assemble and it looks nice! One of my favorite Amazon purchases. I e thought about getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works well for my light items
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to display some fairy houses I made. It looks nice and is sturdy enough for the houses. I would not want to put heavy potted plants on it. It went together easily and I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the way it weathered
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hold up to weather, the finish is destroyed after one summer. I may be wrong but I thought the point of using bamboo was that it could get rained on and still look good. No, it doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Trees and stuff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect plant stand
customer_reviews.text: I bought the stand for african violets and orchids. The build is very sturdy. The screws show. The screws do not sink in the same depth otherwise I would cover them with wooden buttons from local big box store. Regardless I love the look and functionality!
customer_reviews.author: Karen V

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put together. I REALLY like that I can adjust this to fit my tall or short plants. I just really love everything about it. A little more than I wanted to pay but was worth it. I may have to get another one soon if I don't quit collecting different plants
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Plant Stand
customer_reviews.text: Love this plant stand so much. It's a great price, is very light and durable, and looks very good. It's easy to put together and you can rearrange it into many different styles. Definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this plant stand. It is beautiful and goes well with our dining room furniture. I love how sturdy it is and easy it is to put together. Instructions were clear and precise. My plants are beautifully hanging out in the kitchen and I am so happy.
customer_reviews.author: sgtberbecca

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: I think it looks great, my only complaint is that it doesn't have more height between the shelving. I can only store very small plants in those. Ordered a larger one to go next to this one. Assembly was simple, my 11 year old did it in about 20 minutes. Looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: ker

customer_reviews.title: Super-super easy to put together. Way sturdier than I'd have imagined
customer_reviews.text: Love this plant stand. I am already envisioning other uses for it. It's very stylish and sturdy and a nice color. I've got bonsai trees all over it with cool rocks, so it's my mini zen garden, when I need one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Missing predrilled holes on one side of one of the shelves
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars except for the fact the one of the shelves did not have the predrilled holes in the sides. It was easy to assemble until I discovered this problem with their quality control. Thankful, my husband was able to drill them for me to fix this problem.
customer_reviews.author: emoliver

customer_reviews.title: Custom, Strong and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love the customization of these shelves! You can arrange them however you like. I needed something that could hold my tall potted fig tree (middle) and these shelves fit the bill! Easy to assemble and very sturdy. Plus the color is beautiful. My balcony is teeny tiny, so being able to elevate my plant babies has helped declutter the space to better enjoy them :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much I bought it twice
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shelving unit. I bought one a few years ago for plants. Then, when I moved and needed more storage space for my kitchen appliances I bought another to store my Instant Pot, rice cooker, etc. It's been perfect for both uses. The one I'm using as a plant stand has been outside for the past year, with direct sunlight and 80°+ weather for several hours each day, and it still looks great. About to buy a third unit so my succulents can have their own section of the balcony.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.  Holds a ton of plants.
customer_reviews.text: We had a hodge podge of plants and this organizes them well. Of course, we overloaded the top because that's where the most sun hits, but its sturdy and hasn't fallen over (and doesn't seem like it will.) Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Brayack

customer_reviews.title: Great for home decor and plants
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a fan of really light blonde colored wood but this looks so great that I bought another one. I use the other one as a plant stand in a big bay window. It’s gotten water, dirt, and all sorts of stuff on it but still looks brand new. Definitely water resistant and hold heavier pots
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: The "S" shaped allen wrench is a wonderful innovation, much faster than the "L" shaped ones ...
customer_reviews.text: This really does make a difference organizing shoes, plants, amazon package boxes, etc. The "S" shaped allen wrench is a wonderful innovation, much faster than the "L" shaped ones other vendors include.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: Too new to know how well it will hold up in NW weather but it is very attractive and a great herb rack. Had a littler issue with leveling it or I would give it a five.
customer_reviews.author: Keith K.

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing shelf. I needed something for a small space ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing shelf. I needed something for a small space and this is perfect. Wanted to use it as an airy room divider with plants at different levels. I get lots of complements on it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Chapel

customer_reviews.title: Nice plant stand.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived timely in excellent condition. Easy to assemble and is sturdy. I have herbs , bonsai and other plants on it . Love it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Moldy
customer_reviews.text: Already getting moldy, for something that is intended to be used as a plant stand, you would think it stand up to the moisture from the drainage holes better.
customer_reviews.author: camille

product_meta.title: SONGMICS Bamboo Customizable Plant Stand Shelf Flower Pots Holder Display Rack Utility Shelf Bathroom Rack 9-Tier Storage Rack Shelving Unit UBCB93Y
feature_bullets: CUSTOMIZABLE DESIGN: 6 holes in each leg, 8 legs in total. You can assemble them into a 9 tiers linked shelf, or remove the middle shelf to get a 2 separated 3-tier standing shelves. Just enjoy the fun of DIY to assemble more creative racks
ABUNDANT STORAGE SPACE: 9 tiers in total, you can acquire different storage space according to the different assembly method to meet your various storage need
THOUGHTFUL WORKMANSHIP: Natural and smooth finish, rounded corners, countersunk screws protect your family from being scratched, especially the children
PRODUCT DIMENSION: Overall product dimension: 37. 8""L x 35. 4""H x 13""W. Match well with your furniture and add a special condition to your bathroom, living room, balcony, kitchen, etc.
MULTIFUNCTIONAL BAMBOO RACK: 100% natural bamboo, and sturdy; 9 tiers for toiletries, towels, sundries, decorative things, knick knacks, shoes, books, plants, spice and small appliances

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars895 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
